globalwatchlist_description: A watch list that aggregates watch lists from all wikis to any wiki on a single special page.
error_gwl_logged_out: You must be [[Special:UserLogin|logged in]] to the wiki to use [[Special:GlobalWatchlist]].
gwl_label_newpage: This edit created a new page
gwl_label_bot: This edit was performed by a bot
gwl_label_unpatrolled: This edit has not yet been patrolled
gwl_label_plusminus: The page size changed by this number of bytes
below_changes_in: Below are the changes in the last {{PLURAL:$1|$1 hour|$1 hours}}, as of $2, $3.
below_changes_in_days: Below are the changes in the last {{PLURAL:$1|$1 day|$1 days}}, as of $2, $3.
gwl_noresult: No changes during the given period matching these criteria.
gwl_settings_help: Check off the wikis below that you wish to have their watch lists shown on [[Special:GlobalWatchlist]] across all wikis.
gwl_settings_save_success: GWL settings have been saved successfully.
